author: cbs8
title: Toastzr App Indiegogo Campaign: a Social Innovation Project for the Development of a Philanthropic Culture in the Province of Quebec, Canada
text:
Toastzr Inter Coop
But Eventually, This App will also be Working in Any Part of the World Connected to the Internet
TROIS-RIVIERES, Quebec , Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Toastzr Inter Coop is pleased to announce its crowdfunding campaign and project's current state.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/275972
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/275971
Last Monday, October 5 th , 2015, at the Shawinigan Digihub , Quebec (Canada ), with the presence of Pierre Giguere , deputy of the Saint-Maurice region, Michel Angers , Shawinigan mayor, representatives of the press and several guests, including restaurant owners and managers of organizations, and the members of his team, the CEO of Toastzr, Mr. Pidjouma Traore, demonstrated how the soon-to-be-online application will operate.
Toastzr is the easiest way to contribute to a cause without changing any of your dining-out habits. Anyone can be an agent of social change!
Toastzr provides reference listing and an exchange of services. These services facilitate issuing and buying a MEAL VOUCHER which allows people to share a meal for a good cause.
How does it work?
THE HOST CREATES MEAL VOUCHERS
A restaurant, a hotel establishment or any other authorized institution issues a Meal Voucher for a cause already supported by the restaurant, or causes that mean a great deal to customers the host wants to attract or with whom he wants to foster loyalty.
THE GUEST BUYS THE MEAL VOUCHERS ON TOASTZR
The Meal Voucher will allow the guest to reduce the amount of his invoice received from the Host. The validation is securely done using the web or mobile application.
THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES CONTRIBUTIONS
With minimal involvement of its staff, the organization will be getting additional revenues to better serve its community or beneficiaries.
In order to promote the efficient implementation of Toastzr, our funding needs are estimated at $200,000 out of a total of $333,955 . Our online Indiegogo campaign will give you all the details: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/toastzr-app-a-social-innovation-project/x/11992066#/story#en .
Your contribution will help us to establish this social enterprise project in an efficient way. You will thus contribute to the development of a philanthropic culture in the province of Quebec .
"This is a bold project that will make it possible to fund community organizations and see a cooperation between organizations and restaurateurs. I raise a toast to Toastzr!"
- Pierre Giguere , deputy for the Saint-Maurice region, in L'hebdo du Saint-Maurice
Toastzr Inter Coop
www.toastzr.com
Pidjouma Traore, CEO
819-668-1012
